name: Proofpoint Compromised IPs
description: This category is for signatures based on a list of known compromised hosts that is confirmed and updated daily. The signatures in this category can vary from one to several hundred rules depending on the data sources. The data sources for this category comes from several private but highly reliable data sources.

name: Suricata - Botcc
description: This category is for signatures that are autogenerated from several sources of known and confirmed active botnet and other Command and Control (C2) hosts.
